description:
Man, I`m thirsty…hey, what`s this box?
T-This is chocolate!  Homemade chocolate!
W-Who`s the two-bit nobody…and which one of my girls made this for him?!
Trying to steal the innocence of my daughters…I`ll kill him!
Wait, no, I`m not here to cause any trouble!
Damn, they thought I was an intruder again and I ran into this shed…
Hmm?  Satou-kun!  I see, so you`re running from girls trying to give you chocolates, huh?
I know how you feel, son!  I used to be quite a hunk myself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If the Bathroom`s Locked, Use the Snow
